reviews.text: Well located and good amount of service

Quite a big train station. Has stop of services to outside London and central London. Onsite staff happy to help. Platform has facilities for ladies and gents. Waiting room is covered and give sense of protected from adverse weather conditions. Outside of station has excellent network of bus service. Shopping mall just few minutes away.
contains choo choo so is nice

A decent interchange station located in the center of Romford which is nice. Local buses and shops are nearby and all the platforms have step free access via ramps. The station has ticket barriers and frequently running trains to London and Essex. The Upminster shuttle runs from a dedicated platform though shelter on it could be better.
The staff are really knowledgeable and helpful. They offer help before you need to ask.
